verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will build My church, ( I will build My church )
And the gates of hell, ( and the gates of hell )
Shall not prevail, ( shall not prevail ) Against it.
I will build My church, ( I will build My church )
And the gates of hell, ( and the gates of hell )
Shall not prevail, ( shall not prevail ) Against it..

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
So you powers in the heavens above, Bow Down !
So you powers on the earth below, Bow Down !
And acknowledge that Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Is Lord...., Is Lord..
